wrap;max-width:80rem;margin-left:auto;margin-right:auto;padding-left:2rem;padding-right:2rem}}.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.site-content__layout .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:2rem}@media (max-width:899px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>*,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .site-main>:last-child,.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .content-area{padding-right:2.5rem;width:calc(100% - 300px)}}.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:100%}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--has-sidebar .widget-area{width:18.75rem}}.site-content__layout--full-width .content-area{width:100%}.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:1rem}@media (min-width:900px){.site-content__layout--app{padding-left:2rem;padding-right:1rem}.site-content__layout--app *{margin-bottom:0;margin-top:0}.site-content__layout--app .article-list{padding:0}}.site-content__layout--app .site-main{background:-webkit-gradient(linear,left top,right top,from(#bdcadb),color-stop(20%,#d8e4f2),color-stop(47%,#deeaf8),color-stop(72%,#d8e4f3),to(#c1cedf));background:-o-linear-gradient(left,#bdcadb 0,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf 100%);background:linear-gradient(90deg,#bdcadb,#d8e4f2 20%,#deeaf8 47%,#d8e4f3 72%,#c1cedf)}.site-content--has-story-package-hero{max-width:100%;overflow-x:hidden}.widget-area{position:relative;z-index:1}.widget-area>*{margin-bottom:1rem}.widget-area>:last-child{margin-bottom:0}.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase;text-align:center;width:100%}@media (min-width:64rem){.widget-area .article-list__heading,.widget-area .widget-title{font-family:Roboto Condensed,arial,helvetica,verdana,sans-serif;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;line-height:1.2;text-transform:uppercase}}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.landscape:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile){height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:56.25%;position:relative;background-color:#ebebeb}.image-wrapper.portrait:not(.square-on-mobile) img{height:100%;left:0;left:50%;margin-right:-50%;position:absolute;top:0;-webkit-transform:translate(-50%);-ms-transform:translate(-50%);transform:translate(-50%);width:auto}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:133.33333%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.portrait-headshot img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}.image-wrapper.square{height:0;overflow:hidden;padding-bottom:100%;position:relative}.image-wrapper.square img{height:100%;left:0;position:absolute;top:0;width:100%;-o-object-fit:cover;object-fit:cover}@media      <div class="site-content__layout site-content__layout--has-sidebar">
      <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--hero-full" data-module-type="standard layout" id="standard-layout">
       <h2 class="article-list__heading screen-reader-text">
        Headlines
       </h2>
       <div class="article-list__content">
        <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type main-story-link" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1726397" data-collection="article-list1" data-index="0">
         <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list1" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context="[]">
          <h3 class="article-list__article-title">
           <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="CPS parents, kids rally in Millennium Park to demand reopening of high schools" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://wgntv.com/news/chicago-news/cps-parents-kids-rally-in-millennium-park-to-demand-reopening-of-high-schools/">
            CPS parents, kids rally in Millennium Park to demand reopening of high schools
           </a>
          </h3>
          <footer class="article-list__article-meta">
           <a class="article-list__article-category-link category-link-0" data-link-label="Chicago News" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-category-link" href="https://wgntv.com/news/chicago-news/">
            Chicago News
           </a>
           /
           <time datetime="2021-03-21T17:56:12-05:00">
            1 hour ago
           </time>
          </footer>
         </div>
         <figure class="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile">
          <a class="article-list__article-link main-story-link" data-link-label="https://wgntv.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2021/03/1EEA55EFDA8B40D3ADC958A2CADED746.jpg?w=1920&amp;h=1080&amp;crop=1" data-link-pinned="false" data-link-position="0" data-link-type="standard-main-link" href="https://wgntv.com/news/chicago-news/cps-parents-kids-rally-in-millennium-park-to-demand-reopening-of-high-schools/">
           <div class="article-list__article-image-wrapper">
            <div class="image-wrapper landscape vilynx_enabled" data-vilynx-id="LIN_6457863">

             <span class="article-list__article-mediaicon-text">

             </span>
            </span>
           </div>
          </a>
         </figure>
        </article>
        <div class="article-list__read-more article-list__read-more--w-arrow">

               <img alt="" loading="lazy" sizes="50px" src="https://wgntv.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2021/03/adam-newbold-of-lisbon.jpg?w=600&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1" srcset="https://wgntv.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2021/03/adam-newbold-of-lisbon.jpg?w=100&amp;h=100&amp;crop=1 100w, https://wgntv.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2021/03/adam-newbold-of-lisbon.jpg?w=200&amp;h=200&amp;crop=1 200w, https://wgntv.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2021/03/adam-newbold-of-lisbon.jpg?w=300&amp;h=300&amp;crop=1 300w, https://wgntv.com/wp-content/uploads/sites/5/2021/03/adam-newbold-of-lisbon.jpg?w=600&amp;h=540&amp;crop=1 600w"/>

            </a>
           </figure>
          </article>

               <path d="M17.944 5.55a.733.733 0 0 1-.032.34v.03c0 .01-.006.01-.008.01a.189.189 0 0 1-.028.05.619.619 0 0 1-.123.17c-.009.01-.013.02-.023.03l-4.927 4.56a.733.733 0 0 1-.5.19.753.753 0 0 1-.54-.23.737.737 0 0 1 .041-1.04l3.547-3.28H.738a.735.735 0 1 1 0-1.47h14.693l-3.74-3.68a.735.735 0 0 1 1.03-1.05l5.022 4.94s0 .01.008.01a.016.016 0 0 0 .017.01.8.8 0 0 1 .163.32c.007.03.009.06.013.09z">
               </path>
              </svg>
             </span>
            </a>
           </div>
          </section>
          <section class="article-list article-list--story-grid article-list--story-grid--one-col">
           <h2 class="article-list__heading">
            Dean's List
           </h2>
           <div class="article-list__content">
            <article class="article-list__article article-list__article--is-stacked article-list__article--has-thumb article-list__article--is-media-type" data-anvato-params="null" data-article-id="1726213" data-collection="article-list6" data-index="0">
             <div class="article-list__article-text" data-article-list-id="article-list6" data-article-text-classes="article-list__article-text" data-article-thumb-classes="article-list__article-thumb article-list__article-thumb--is-fullbleed-on-mobile" data-current-image-context='["16:9","(max-width: 1023px) 50vw, 512px"]'>

         </a>
        </li>
        <li class="network-footer-best-reviews">
         <a href="https://bestreviews.com/" target="_blank">
          Best Reviews
         </a>
        </li>
        <li>
         <a data-component="NexstarCCPA" href="#">

      </div>
     </div>

   (function() {
	var _sf_async_config = window._sf_async_config = (window._sf_async_config || {});

	_sf_async_config.sections = "";
	_sf_async_config.authors = "";
	function loadChartbeat() {
			var e = document.createElement('script');
			var n = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
			e.type = 'text/javascript';
			e.async = true;
			e.src = '//static.chartbeat.com/js/chartbeat.js';
			n.parentNode.insertBefore(e, n);
	}
	loadChartbeat();
})();
